review: I am impressed with how easy it is to start up and use.  Works well, no problems  A great bargain !!
author: Mary O.

review: Great product.  Already had Prime, great compliment to that service. Easy install, works great. Really good selection on Prime video, and it streams Netflix to boot? Almost ready to cut the cable!
author: rdebose

review: Excellent for entertainment, I do wish there were current sports options. Have I missed something?
author: allen biddle

review: The device was easy install following the instructions provided.  It has functioned without any problems although two floors away from our router.  We are very pleased with the Fire TV Stick.
author: James H.

review: I like it for what we need it for. My daughter was always hogging the main tv because it had netflix. Got her the stick for her room and she loves it. The only thing I would complain about is the advertising. Getting a second one for my son's tv.
author: richard

review: Great device , very happy  recommend it very highly.
author: guadalupe zarate

review: Really Great . With free local TV, and the "Fire Stick", WHO needs CABLE,  I get to choose WHAT I want to see.
author: Theresa S Hawkins

review: Have only begun to use it, but am very satisfied at this point.
author: Judith
